name: Battleship
description: Built a playable version of Battleship against a computer opponent.  Utilized HTML and CSS to build a thoughtfully designed game board using flexbox and grid layouts.  Wrote JavaScript in MVC architecture that generates random game boards for both the computer and player using recursion, and enabled the computer to make informed guesses by interacting with DOM Elements.

name: JTE Collective
description: Built a MEN-stack application for selling items and bidding on others' listings.  Utilized RESTful routes that allow users, logged in through Google OAuth, to create detailed sale posts, edit those posts, and delete them.  Mongoose schemas were applied to organize data for the listings, their bidding auctions, and categories of items.  Created using JavaScript, EJS, MongoDB and Mongoose, Express, and Node.js.
